testCase.name: MatComponentsComponent should create the component
MatComponentsComponent Initial State should initialize filterValues with default values
MatComponentsComponent Initial State should initialize roles array
MatComponentsComponent Initial State should initialize displayedColumns
MatComponentsComponent Initial State should initialize dataSource as MatTableDataSource
MatComponentsComponent Initial State should initialize allEmails and filteredEmails
MatComponentsComponent Constructor and Effect should set up effect and update dataSource
MatComponentsComponent Constructor and Effect should not update paginator in effect if paginator is undefined
MatComponentsComponent createFilterPredicate should return false when global filter does not match
MatComponentsComponent createFilterPredicate should return false when firstName filter does not match
MatComponentsComponent createFilterPredicate should return false when email filter does not match
MatComponentsComponent createFilterPredicate should return false when role filter does not match
MatComponentsComponent createFilterPredicate should return false when date range does not match
MatComponentsComponent createFilterPredicate should handle null fields in user data
MatComponentsComponent trackById should return user id
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should render toolbar with title and buttons
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should render error message when error exists
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should render loading spinner when isLoading is true
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should render filters when not loading
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should render table with correct columns and data
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should render paginator with correct options
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should trigger refreshTable on refresh button click
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should trigger deleteUser on delete button click
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should update global filter and call applyFilter
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should update firstName filter and call applyFilter
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should update email filter and call applyFilter
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should update role filter and call applyFilter
MatComponentsComponent Template Rendering should update date range filter and call applyFilter
